channel.title: Posts on Boredom
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Boredom

item.title: First Post
item.description: Hello, world! Hi there! Since this is my first post here, I should introduce myself. Hi, I’m Mario, I’m a Computer Engineering student and I’m starting this blog out of boredom. I’ve wanted to start a blog for a while now and I think it might be a good way to track my progress in learning things. This blog won’t have a specific topic, as I am interested in way to many things to be specific about just one.
